familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $15,001 - $50,000 in Capital Gains Interest income from KF- Park Street Capital PE Fund IX, LLC (Financial investments in Park Street Capital Private Equity Fund; Boston, MA) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: KF- Park Street Capital PE Fund IX, LLC (Financial Investments In Park Street Capital Private Equity Fund; Boston, MA)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $15,001 - $50,000 in Capital Gains Interest income from KF- Park Street Capital PE Fund IX, LLC (Financial investments in Park Street Capital Private Equity Fund; Boston, MA) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. This asset has been divested. Income amount is estimated.
familyMemberEthics.business: KF- Park Street Capital PE Fund IX, LLC (Financial Investments In Park Street Capital Private Equity Fund; Boston, MA)

familyMemberEthics.description: Another asset of Jared Kushner's, KF- Park Street Capital PE Fund IX, LLC, is reportedly invested in Park Street Capital Private Equity Fund. However, Park Street Capital Private Equity Fund is not included in his 2017 financial disclosure. Because the investment vehicle reportedly has been divested, this record is categorized as a resolved potential conflict of interest.
familyMemberEthics.business: Park Street Capital Private Equity Fund; Boston, MA
